definitions.definition: An electronic communication medium that allows the transmission of real-time visual images, and often sound.
examples: She watched the television for over five hours.

definitions.definition: An electronic home entertainment device equipped with a screen and a speaker for receiving television signals and displaying them in audio-visual form.
examples: I have an old television in the study.

definitions.definition: Collectively, the programs broadcast via the medium of television.
examples: fifty-seven channels and nothing on television

main_definition: ( uncountable , broadcasting ) An electronic communication medium that allows the transmission of real-time visual images, and often sound.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An electronic home entertainment device equipped with a screen and a speaker for receiving television signals and displaying them in audio-visual form.
( uncountable ) Collectively, the programs broadcast via the medium of television.
( uncountable , dated ) Vision at a distance.
